suppress.notes: file name: netty-tcnative-classes-2.0.46.Final.jar - appears to be false positive

file name: json-20201115.jar CVE-2022-45688 in org.json/json - misleading CPE The cpe on the NIST site: cpe:2.3:a:hutool:hutool:5.8.10:*:*:*:*:*:*:* does not seem related to org.json/json https://github.com/jeremylong/DependencyCheck/issues/5401 users can already have some control by setting the -Xss JVM option

file name: nimbus-jose-jwt-9.22.jar (shaded: net.minidev:json-smart:2.4.8) This is a false positive as we have net.minidev:json-smart:2.4.10 as a dependency and we don't have ini-parser as a dependency.
file name: azure-identity-1.10.3.jar This is a false positive as version from 1.10.2 are fixed.
